 /** @namespace EAM.Helper **/
 
 /**
 * @typedef {Object} Options
 * @memberof EAM.Helper
 * @property {EAM.Values} priority
 */
 
 /**
 * Element
 * @class
 * @memberof EAM.Helper
 * @param {EAM.Eam} eam
 * @param {EAM.Helper.Options} options Initial configuration.
 */
function Helper(eam, options){
 
	var helpers = {
		'jquery'    : require('./helper-jquery.js'),
		'satellite' : require('./helper-satellite.js'),
	}
 
 	/**
     * Set initial state using options.
     * @private 
     */
	function selectHelper(priority){
 
		var names = priority.split(',');
 
		for(var i=0; i< names.length; i++){
 
			var name   = names[i];
			var helper = helpers[name];
 
			Eif(helper && helper(eam.global)[0] == eam.global){
				return helper;
			}
		}
	}
 
 	/**
     * jQuery interface
     */
	this.$ = selectHelper(options.priority);
}
 
module.exports = Helper;
